headline: Obama And Clinton Megadonor Sentenced, Dems Silent
author: Hailey Sanibel
sentences: As prosecutors revealed, there was a disgusting layer of perversion and manipulation in what amounted to a significantly large operation.Buck was a well-known contributor within Democrat circles.
A high-profile, big-spending Democrat donor, was sentenced to thirty years in a federal prison for his role in distributing illegal drugs that resulted in the deaths of two people.
Black Lives Matter, right?Ed Buck was found guilty on nine counts of drug-related charges last summer, including distributing methamphetamines that led to the fatal overdoses.
It should be noted that those two deaths were of black men.
Over the years, he has funded far-left radicals
